original_text: Together with 250 leaders of the Israelites, they all turned against Moses. Those were famous men that the people had chosen as their leaders.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손 총회에서 택함을 받은 자 곧 회중 가운데에서 이름 있는 지휘관 이백오십 명과 함께 일어나서 모세를 거스르니라

sentences.original_text: Together with 250 leaders of the Israelites
that the people had chosen as their leaders
